channel.title: All jobs | upwork.com
channel.description: All jobs as of December 02, 2022 15:45 UTC

item.title: Senior Backend Engineer - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking to add multiple Software Engineers (Frontend, Backend, Fullstack) to our team and help innovate our expanding group of products. You will have full ownership of a product together with your team.

TempMee is changing the way the world works - starting with the Dental Industry! We are an ambitious and motivated tech startup that has secured multiple rounds of venture backing to create an Uber-like platform/app to disrupt the dental staffing industry. After launching in late 2019, we have already built the largest community of nationwide hygienists and dental offices, dwarfing our established competition in the dental tech staffing space. It is truly a matter of time until TempMee is the industry standard for dental staffing needs in the Dental Community!

We are in the process of rapidly expanding the capabilities and functions of our app to capture even more market share, and we need high-quality developers like you to come aboard and help make TempMee a Unicorn (Unicorn=Start-ups evaluated at $1 billion within five years of launch).

Working with TempMee means you will be working alongside committed fellow engineers who know their work is critical to the company's success. We are a people-first company that actively seeks your input to make you be more successful in your role! We like to have fun with our work and encourage you to get to know the people you work with. We have a motto - Hard work doesn’t have to be serious!

Qualifications:

- 5 years of experience with software development in one or more programming languages
- 3 years of experience testing, maintaining, or launching software products, and 1 year of experience with software design and architecture
- Solid programming skills in JavaScript and/or Golang
- Knowledge of basic visual and user experience principles
- Experience in building pixel-perfect design implementation
- Deep understanding of relational database systems, specifically MySQL and Postgres
- Understanding NoSQL Datastores such as ElasticSearch, MongoDB is a plus
- Experience building scalable, performant, and modular solutions
- Understanding of modern cloud technologies such as AWS and Google Cloud
- Experience with microservices and service-oriented architecture

What you'll do

- Work in an exciting and high-growth startup
- Research novel solutions to nuanced and often unchartered engineering challenges
- Work with designers, product managers, and engineers to design impactful products
- Perform and uphold code best practices.
- Produce high-quality code that raises the bar for all engineering team members
- Improve scalable distributed systems on the cloud
- Improve web applications for performance and scalability
- Perform quality assurance/debugging procedures to provide a secure and functional delivery
- Implement testing protocols for managing successful deployments across development, staging, and production environments
- Recommend system solutions by comparing the advantages and disadvantages of custom development and purchase alternatives

We are excited to meet you!

Hourly Range: $30.00-$50.00
Posted On: December 02, 2022 15:31 UTC
Category: Back-End Development
Skills:Golang, Microservice, PostgreSQL, JavaScript, API, MongoDB, Software Architecture & Design, RESTful API, Database
Skills: Golang, Microservice, PostgreSQL, JavaScript, API, MongoDB, Software Architecture & Design, RESTful API, Database
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Develop app with Angular, React, Vue and Golang - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a Full Stack Developer with experience in Angular, React, Vue and Golang. Project includes building 10 pages and integration with Golang Backend codes.

If the project goes well, we have several other projects with Front End Design and Backend Development - so this can become a long term engagement for the right candidate.

Experience with Firebase, GraphQL, PostgreSQL, AWS, CI/CD

Appreciate the interest in advance!



Hourly Range: $45.00-$65.00

Skills: Golang, Angular, JavaScript, Vue.js, Amazon Web Services, PostgreSQL, GraphQL, React, Firebase, CI/CD

item.title: Java Developer - Upwork
item.description:
Position Requirements:
• BE/B.Tech or Similar (Technology/IT/Computer Science or related field).
• 2-5 years of relevant work experience designing and developing applications in high-paced environments; majorly in Product based organizations.
• Demonstrated expertise in building and enhancing scalable and high-performance services
• Proven working experience on Java / C++ / C# / Go.
• Knowledge and application of design concepts like Design Patterns, Data Modeling, and SOA (Service Oriented Architecture).
• Experience in Web Services, JSON, JUnit, SQL, PL/SQL, NoSQL, Maven, and Spring.
• Experience with Agile (Scrum) and test-driven development, continuous integration (Jenkins), and version control (GIT).
• Worked on performance optimization, memory profiling, and scalability of applications (cloud environment would be preferable).
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Good interpersonal and communication skills.

Role:
• Develop high-performance systems to publish REST Services.
• Deliver services for high availability, with high quality.
• Work closely with software developers to develop the best implementations. Develop efficient, reusable, reliable, and scalable software
• Provide/Recommend solutions inclusive of third-party open-source APIs
• Ability to do root cause analysis and improve product quality.
• Exposure to Amazon Web Services and associated technologies
• Work closely with Enterprise Clients and Map Requirements to Platform features


Hourly Range: $10.00-$12.00
Posted On: December 02, 2022 06:20 UTC
Category: Back-End Development
Skills:Golang, JUnit, Java, API, RESTful API, Core Java, Design Pattern, Data Modeling, NoSQL Database, Spring Framework
Skills: Golang, JUnit, Java, API, RESTful API, Core Java, Design Pattern, Data Modeling, NoSQL Database, Spring Framework
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Blockchain Developer - Upwork
item.description:
Blockchain Developer Urgent!!!

Please do not apply if you are not available for relocation!!!!!

On-site Job. Apply if you are willing to be relocated to Southeast Asia, Laukkaing Myanmar
Full Job Description
Phoenix Community is a comprehensive platform with application ecosystems such as social networking, shopping, games, Metaverse, digital currency issuance, and trading.

Our team is extremely passionate and works tirelessly to bridge the gap between what blockchain is and what blockchain can be. We strive to maintain an atmosphere that fosters innovation and new ideas through collaboration, research, and deep discussions.


Preferred Qualifications
Go lang developerï¼Œ Vue or React developer and Flutter developer
5+ years of programming experience designing and building high-volume, scalable applications from end-to-end

Benefits when working with Phoenix Community
flexible working hours;
ability to choose the project and the team;
support for personal and professional growth;
5000USDT-8000USDT salary
Free board and lodging, free meals


Budget: $5,000
Posted On: December 02, 2022 05:30 UTC
Category: Emerging Tech
Skills:Golang, Blockchain, Smart Contract, Distributed Ledger Technology, Flutter, Vue.js, React
Skills: Golang, Blockchain, Smart Contract, Distributed Ledger Technology, Flutter, Vue.js, React
Country: Philippines

item.title: Senior Golang developer for data management system - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a self-driven developer to bring our project to the next level. Our system is currently in production and used internally. We receive regular feedback and requirements from our internal team, so you can expect to be working in a dynamic and fast-paced environment with exciting development ideas every week.

At a high level, the project involves a data pipeline connecting various time series data sources with many other microservices to ensure robustness. We work with a range of popular technologies such as time series databases, Kafka, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, gRPC + Protobuf, and many more.

We are a small but focused team, so you will be working closely with the tech lead to further advance developments/optimizations in our backend system. We are looking at a minimum of 6 months to 1 year of engagement to help our product make an impact in the financial space. There will be plenty of opportunities to learn and grow to become top players in this industry.

Responsibilities:
Write production-grade code, with attention to performance and data validity
Write unit tests for components to ensure all works well
Communicate frequently with our tech lead to discuss issues/tasks or suggest ideas/improvements

Requirements:
3+ years of Golang experience
Self-driven, sense of ownership & urgency, and attention to detail
Familiar with concurrency concepts

Nice to haves:
Experience working with Kubernetes (creating new services/optimizing existing services/troubleshooting issues)
Experience utilizing gRPC framework and serializing data with Protobufs
Experience integrating data caching solutions (i.e. Read-through Write-through caching) for managing large amounts of data in memory
Familiar with message queues concepts (Kafka, ZeroMQ, etc)


Perks:
Work with a team of highly intellectual individuals who are eager to be the best and prove their worth (we are very selective)
High-trust environment (as long as you get things done)
Experience working with performance-oriented and high-load systems
Work in fintech industry

Hourly Range: $30.00-$50.00
Posted On: December 01, 2022 22:01 UTC
Category: Back-End Development
Skills:Database Architecture, Database Design, Software Architecture & Design, Business with 10-99 Employees, Golang, DevOps, NodeJS Framework, Database
Skills: Database Architecture, Database Design, Software Architecture & Design, Business with 10-99 Employees, Golang, DevOps, NodeJS Framework, Database
Country: Malaysia
click to apply

item.title: DevOps Engineer - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a DevOps Engineer to help us build functional systems that improve customer experience.

DevOps Engineer responsibilities include working with product to setup new tools and resources within AWS, assist in setting up new integrations and data pipes,  and integrating / deploying partner API's. If you have a solid background in software engineering and are familiar with SQL,  Python, Scala, GoLang or similar we’d like to meet you.

Ultimately, you will execute and automate operational processes fast, accurately and securely.

- Implement integrations
- Provide technical support
- Build and deploy tools
- Investigate and resolve technical issues
- Develop scripts to automate data pipes

Hourly Range: $36.00-$60.00
Posted On: December 01, 2022 17:39 UTC
Category: DevOps Engineering
Skills:Linux, Ubuntu, Git, AWS Glue, Apache Airflow, DevOps, Amazon Web Services, Amazon Redshift, RESTful API, Golang
Skills: Linux, Ubuntu, Git, AWS Glue, Apache Airflow, DevOps, Amazon Web Services, Amazon Redshift, RESTful API, Golang
Country: United States
click to apply
